statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND vehicle_type = 'SUV';
DELETE FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE emission_level > 5.0 AND date_recorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM VehicleEmissions WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND emission_level < 0.5;
DELETE FROM TransportationData WHERE trip_id = 500 AND trip_distance > 100.0;
DELETE FROM EnvironmentImpact WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM Emissions WHERE timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND emission_level > 5.0;
DELETE FROM emission_testing WHERE tester_name = 'John Doe' AND testing_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_info WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2010
